Summary: I spotted an obect in the sky that was flying very quickly. It hovered, and changed directions. It also had multiple lights blinking from it.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
divs: Sighting DetailsMy co-worker yelled for me to come outside while she was on her smoke brake. She was yelling that there was a UFO in the sky. I went outside and immediately spotted the UFO. It was flying across the sky very fast, much faster than any plane. It appeared to be hovering and would even move vertical. It changed directions several times and disappeared behind some tress for a moment. It also had blinking lights that were all different colors (violet, pink, green, and blue). Then it was suddenly gone and we didn't see it anymore. We have checked the sky in the same place the last few nights and have not seen anything.
